item.description:
Blithewold Mansion & Gardens is a 33-acre summer estate with grand views of Narragansett Bay The property features a 45-room mansion filled with family heirlooms framed by a series of lovely gardens than range in character from mysterious to exotic, and from poetic to workmanlike. An exceptional collection of rare and unusual plants, specimen trees, an accessible greenhouse, and whimsical stonework project a character that is romantic, fresh and inspiring – and unique.

Come take a tour of the mansion (optional) gardens and grounds.

General Admission Tickets

Adult    $11.00
AAA     $10.00
Senior   $9.00

Please note: I will not be able to attend/organize this meetup as I now have a family obligation on this day. I have added another Blithewold Trip on June 15th so you can attend that day or keep your plans for this Meetup. You'll just need to coordinate with folks the details of the day.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet where tickets are purchased at Blithewold.
item.name: Blithewold Mansion & Gardens
